title: Eating avocado at least twice a week ‘could lower your risk of heart disease’: Latest US study
description: Avocados are not a luxury fruit, it's time we came to terms with that. Not should it be just the king of fruits on a Superbowl Sunday alone. Its health benefits have stunned researchers and they in turn are trying to weave in an affordable and recommended amount of avocado into our diets.
content:

KEY HIGHLIGHTS Avocados are not yet the fruit of preference in developing nations.

title: These are the advantages of exercising in a group for those over 65
description: No one is exempt from doing physical exercise.
